wikitext.*:
'''''túr''''' is a [[Noldorin]] noun meaning "mastery, victory".<ref name=LR395>{{LR|Etymologies}} , p. 395.</ref><ref name=VT46/>

[[David Salo]] has suggested that the form ''tûr'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Elvish|Neo-Sindarin]].<ref>{{HM|GS}}, pp. 319, 335</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[TUR]]<ref name=LR395/>

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''túre''<ref name=LR395/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

''túr'' was erroneously rendered as ''tûr'' in the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']].<ref name=VT46>{{VT|46a}}, p. 20</ref>
